resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105893</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105893</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206954</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water: Source of Health; Source of Illness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser: Quelle der Gesundheit; Quelle
der Krankheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau : Source de santé ; Source de 
maladie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água: Fonte da saúde; Fonte da 
doença</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua: Sorgente di salute; Sorgente 
della malattia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύδωρ: Πηγή υγείας  Πηγή ασθένειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agua: Fuente de la salud; Fuente de 
la enfermedad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students examine the connections between water and disease in four West African countries and then devise a strategy to fight one water-borne illness in rural Africa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Kursteilnehmer überprüfen die 
Anschlüsse zwischen Wasser und Krankheit in vier afrikanischen 
Westländern und planen dann eine Strategie, um eine durch Wasser 
übertragene Krankheit in landwirtschaftlichem Afrika zu kämpfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'aides examinent les connexions 
entre l'eau et la maladie dans quatre pays africains occidentaux et 
puis conçoivent une stratégie pour combattre une maladie portée par
les eaux en Afrique rurale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ajudas examinam as conexões 
entre a água e a doença em quatro países africanos ocidentais e 
planejam então uma estratégia para lutar uma doença water-borne em 
África rural.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di aiuti esaminano i collegamenti fra
acqua e la malattia in quattro paesi africani ad ovest ed allora 
inventano una strategia per combattere una malattia di origine idrica 
in Africa rurale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βοηθά τους σπουδαστές να εξετάσουν τις συνδέσεις 
μεταξύ του ύδατος και της ασθένειας σε τέσσερις δυτικές της 
Αφρικής χώρες και να επινοήσουν έπειτα μια στρατηγική για να 
παλεψει μια πλωτή ασθένεια στην αγροτική Αφρική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ayudas examinan las 
conexiones entre el agua y la enfermedad en cuatro países africanos 
del oeste y después idean una estrategia para luchar una enfermedad 
flotante en África rural.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206954</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105893</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/water-source-of-health-source-of-illness</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
